distribution.text: Copyright 2023 SUSE LLC. All rights reserved.

notes.text:
This update for bash fixes an issue that could lead to syntax errors when parsing
scripts that use expr(1) inside loops.

Additionally, the popd build-in now ensures that the normalized stack offset is
within bounds before trying to free that stack entry. This fixes a segmentation
fault.
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.text: popd in bash might allow local users to bypass the restricted shell and cause a use-after-free via a crafted address.
notes.title: Vulnerability description
